an9.26:1.2: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca candikāputto rājagahe viharanti veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an9.26:1.3: Tatra kho āyasmā candikāputto bhikkhū āmantesi (…):
an9.26:1.5: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā citaṁ hoti, tassetaṁ bhikkhuno kallaṁ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:1.6: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.
an9.26:2.1: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ candikāputtaṁ etadavoca:
an9.26:2.2: “na kho, āvuso candikāputta, devadatto bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
an9.26:2.3: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā citaṁ hoti, tassetaṁ bhikkhuno kallaṁ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:2.4: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
an9.26:2.5: Evañca kho, āvuso, candikāputta, devadatto bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
an9.26:2.6: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti, tassetaṁ bhikkhuno kallaṁ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:2.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.

an9.26:5.1: Kathañca, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti?
an9.26:5.2: ‘Vītarāgaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.3: ‘vītadosaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.4: ‘vītamohaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.5: ‘asarāgadhammaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.6: ‘asadosadhammaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.7: ‘asamohadhammaṁ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.8: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ kāmabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.9: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ rūpabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.26:5.10: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ arūpabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti.
an9.26:5.11: Evaṁ sammā vimuttacittassa kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṁ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:5.12: amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ, vayaṁ cassānupassati.
an9.26:6.2: Tassassu aṭṭha kukkū heṭṭhā nemaṅgamā, aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassa.
an9.26:6.3: Atha puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṁ saṅkampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an9.26:6.6: atha dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṁ saṅkampeyya na sampavedheyya.
an9.26:6.9: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, sammā vimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṁ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:6.10: amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ, vayaṁ cassānupassati.
an9.26:7.5: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṁ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:7.6: amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ, vayaṁ cassānupassatī”ti.
